name: yuu
normalized: …nn?
and then, i felt that something was out of place in the room as i entered it.

name: yuu
normalized: …what?
i didn't understand the meaning of it.
but, i sensed something beyond my five senses.

name: yuu
normalized: …perhaps someone was in the room?
for what?
that was only known to the person that had enteredand a mystery that no one else but the trespasser knew.
i was using this room for my own personal use asthere was no alternately sharing of rooms by other staff members in this facility.
i had scarcely few private things from the startand i knew i hadn't left anything lying around thatmight expose me as an "earthling".
if someone had entered this room with a certainintention in mind, then…
the out of place feeling didn't go away.
i know that there was nothing in this room that wasconnected to my true character had someone actuallytaken the trouble to search the room.

name: yuu
normalized: but, it's better to take precaution
i felt a bout of tension go up my spine.
i was moving not as the earthling "yuu saitou" butin accordance with my sixth sense as the assassin"wooden face".
i had to act fast.
i took out the camera lens that was hidden onthis earth-made cellphone that was in reach.
the camera lens was no bigger than the ball of a finger, but it could store no less than 50 hours of image data.
i had set it up above the door so that it didn't stand out.

name: yuu
normalized: i hope i'm not being too cautious…but, if there really was someone in this room, then…
and so when they came snooping around again, then…
upon realizing it and using my fingers to return the perverse grin on my lips, i headed to bed for the night.

name: yuu
normalized: …no, no way
yuu saitou's" disguise was flawless, with theexception of when i visited misleet.
in the first place, there was no evidence to beable to identify that i wasn't an earthling, soi shouldn't be exposed.
even if someone came in here, they probably leftbecause they didn't find anything they could useagainst me.

name: yuu
normalized: maybe i'm a little paranoid
perhaps going to misleet these past several dayshas made me too paranoid about my secret getting out.
consenting to that, i headed to bed for the night.
